Compatible (tested) with iOS 8, 9 and 10.

betterNC10 gives you visual and functional options to make prettier and better your Notification Center and Notifications adding nice Features like:

- Make Clear the Notifications with one Single Tap.

- Make the Date of Today in One Line on Notification Center and Today View.

- Hide the Today Date Text on Today View.

- Hide the Date Labels on Notifications.

- Make Dark, Clear, Grey or No Blur the Background of the Notification Center.

- Disable the Invoke Gesture of Notification Center the by pulling down on the StatusBar.

- Don't wake up the Screen when receiving a Notification.

- Hide the Today View when pulling down the Notification Center and Hide the Today Date Text swiping Right on LockScreen.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Credits/Testers are on Preferences Panel.

would be greatly appreciated!
